title: [META] Agent SDK Auth - Project Progress Tracker
description:
## Project Overview
**Project:** Agent SDK Auth Extension
**Goal:** Add reliable authentication flows for Codex and Gemini SDKs comparable to Claude, with fallback options including CLIProxy.

## Context
- Claude Agent SDK currently uses OAuth token (env-based) and works - keep unchanged
- Adapter registry supports CLI-oriented Codex, Gemini, Factory Droid, Aider, OpenCode, Mistral with simulation fallback
- This project adds proper auth flows for Codex and Gemini with CLIProxy fallback when native OAuth is unavailable

## Session Tracking
This issue is used for session handoff between agents.
Each agent (coding and audit) should add a comment summarizing their session.

## Quality Assurance System

This project uses a periodic audit system for quality assurance:

**Workflow:**
1. Coding agents implement features and mark them Done with 'awaiting-audit' label
2. Every ~10 features, an Opus audit agent reviews all pending work
3. Audit agent either approves (label → 'audited') or creates [FIX] issues
4. Coding agents fix bugs, and fixes get re-audited in the next cycle

**Labels:**
- `awaiting-audit`: Completed but not yet reviewed
- `audited`: Passed quality review
- `fix`: Bug found during audit
- `audit-finding`: Issues identified in audit sessions
- `has-bugs`: Features awaiting bug fixes
- `needs-decomposition`: Tasks too large for single session

## Implementation Phases

### Phase 1: Auth Options Inventory (Research)
- Document Claude flow specifics
- Research Codex CLI auth modes and token storage
- Research Gemini CLI auth modes and token storage

### Phase 2: Codex Auth Path
- Implement Codex CLI/device-code OAuth flow
- Add Codex CLIProxy fallback
- Add Codex adapter enforcement

### Phase 3: Gemini Auth Path
- Implement Gemini CLI/device-code OAuth flow
- Add Gemini API key fallback
- Add Gemini CLIProxy fallback
- Add Gemini adapter enforcement

### Phase 4: Shared Auth Utilities
- Add shared auth resolver helper
- Extend config schema
- Normalize auth diagnostics

### Phase 5: Adapter Wiring
- Wire Codex adapter
- Wire Gemini adapter
- Ensure simulation mode bypasses

### Phase 6: Testing
- Unit tests for auth resolution matrix
- Manual integration test documentation
- Proxy smoke tests

### Phase 7: Documentation
- Update README and config docs
- Document CLI login commands
- Create troubleshooting guide

### Phase 8: Rollout Safety
- Default to simulation mode
- Verify Claude unchanged
- Ensure actionable errors

## Key Milestones
- [ ] Phase 1 complete (Auth inventory research)
- [ ] Phase 2 complete (Codex auth path)
- [ ] Phase 3 complete (Gemini auth path)
- [ ] Phase 4 complete (Shared utilities)
- [ ] Phase 5 complete (Adapter wiring)
- [ ] Phase 6 complete (Testing)
- [ ] Phase 7 complete (Documentation)
- [ ] Phase 8 complete (Rollout safety)
- [ ] First audit completed (10 features)
- [ ] All features complete
- [ ] Final audit and polish done

- Total issues: 105
- Open: 105
- In Progress: 0
- Closed: 0

## Notes
- Project initialized from AGENT_SDK_AUTH_PLAN.md
- Issues organized by phase with proper dependencies
- Parent issues track sub-task completion
